name: VALERIA

description.short: Multi-way Ballgown with premium textured tulle and shimmer lace.
description.full:
Details

  • Style: Multi-way Ballgown
  • Fabric: Premium Textured Tulle & Shimmer Lace
  • Size: Onhand Medium to Large Frame

Features

  • Sweetheart corset bodice with intricate lace detailing.
  • Full, voluminous ballgown skirt with a grand cathedral trail.
  • Detachable draped off-shoulder sleeves.
  • Detachable matching lace gloves for a high-fashion finish.
  • Adjustable lace-up back for a perfect fit.

Availability

  • Open for Rental (Shop display)

priceMessage: Message us on Facebook for the rental price
